verses.verse: This <S%G5124><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> also, <S%G1161><s%> that in the last <S%G2078><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> perilous <S%G5467><s%> times <S%G5550><s%> shall come. <S%G1764><s%>

For men <S%G444><s%> shall be lovers <S%G5367><s%> of their own selves, <S%G5367><s%> covetous, <S%G5366><s%> boasters, <S%G213><s%> proud, <S%G5244><s%> blasphemers, <S%G989><s%> disobedient <S%G545><s%> to parents, <S%G1118><s%> unthankful, <S%G884><s%> unholy, <S%G462><s%>

Without <S%G794><s%> natural affection, <S%G794><s%> truce breakers, <S%G786><s%> false <S%G1228><s%> accusers, <S%G1228><s%> incontinent, <S%G193><s%> fierce, <S%G434><s%> despisers <S%G865><s%> of those that are good, <S%G865><s%>

Traitors, <S%G4273><s%> heady, <S%G4312><s%> high minded, <S%G5187><s%> lovers <S%G5369><s%> of pleasures <S%G5369><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> lovers <S%G5377><s%> of God; <S%G5377><s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> a form <S%G3446><s%> of godliness, <S%G2150><s%> but denying <S%G720><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> thereof: <S%G846><s%> from such <S%G5128><s%> turn <S%G665><s%> away. <S%G665><s%>

For of this <S%G5130><s%> sort are they which creep <S%G1744><s%> <S%G1519><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> houses, <S%G3614><s%> and lead <S%G162><s%> captive <S%G162><s%> silly <S%G1133><s%> women <S%G1133><s%> laden <S%G4987><s%> with sins, <S%G266><s%> led <S%G71><s%> away with divers <S%G4164><s%> lusts, <S%G1939><s%>
Ever <S%G3842><s%> learning, <S%G3129><s%> and never <S%G3368><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the truth. <S%G225><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> as Jannes <S%G2389><s%> and Jambres <S%G2387><s%> withstood <S%G436><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> do these <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> resist <S%G436><s%> the truth: <S%G225><s%> men <S%G444><s%> of corrupt <S%G2704><s%> minds, <S%G3563><s%> reprobate <S%G96><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the faith. <S%G4102><s%>

But they shall proceed <S%G4298><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> further: <S%G1909><s%> <S%G4118><s%> for their folly <S%G454><s%> shall be manifest <S%G1552><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men, as their's <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1565><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was.

But you have fully <S%G3877><s%> known <S%G3877><s%> my doctrine, <S%G1319><s%> manner <S%G72><s%> of life, <S%G72><s%> purpose, <S%G4286><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> long-suffering, <S%G3115><s%> charity, <S%G26><s%> patience, <S%G5281><s%>

Persecutions, <S%G1375><s%> afflictions, <S%G3804><s%> which <S%G3634><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> to me at <S%G1722><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Iconium, <S%G2430><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Lystra; <S%G3082><s%> what <S%G3634><s%> persecutions <S%G1375><s%> I endured: <S%G5297><s%> but out of them all <S%G3956><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> delivered <S%G4506><s%> me.

Yes, <S%G1161><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> that will <S%G2309><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> godly <S%G2153><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> shall suffer <S%G1377><s%> persecution. <S%G1377><s%>
But evil <S%G4190><s%> men <S%G444><s%> and seducers <S%G1114><s%> shall wax <S%G4298><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%> and worse, <S%G5501><s%> deceiving, <S%G4105><s%> and being deceived. <S%G4105><s%>

But continue <S%G3306><s%> you in the things which <S%G3739><s%> you have learned <S%G3129><s%> and have been assured <S%G4104><s%> of, knowing <S%G1492><s%> of whom <S%G5101><s%> you have learned <S%G3129><s%> them;

And that from a child <S%G1025><s%> you have known <S%G1492><s%> the holy <S%G2413><s%> scriptures, <S%G1121><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are able <S%G1410><s%> to make <S%G4679><s%> you wise <S%G4679><s%> to salvation <S%G4991><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> scripture <S%G1124><s%> is given by inspiration <S%G2315><s%> of God, <S%G2315><s%> and is profitable <S%G5624><s%> for doctrine, <S%G1319><s%> for reproof, <S%G1650><s%> for correction, <S%G1882><s%> for instruction <S%G3809><s%> in righteousness: <S%G1343><s%>
That the man <S%G444><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> may be perfect, <S%G739><s%> thoroughly <S%G1822><s%> furnished <S%G1822><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>
